## NgSelectWebComponent.executeAndReturnWC() method

Executes function on NgSelect and returns result

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  func | NgSelectFunction&lt;TResult, TValue&gt; | Function that is executed and its result is returned |
